sentences.en: As method of attracting new business its value is questionable.
sentences.cn: 但是作为招揽新客户的方法其价值尚有疑问.

sentences.en: Doesn't all of this seem like rather questionable clowning?
sentences.cn: 这一切难道不是破绽百出的滑稽表演 吗 ?

sentences.en: He has been dogged by allegations of questionable business practices.
sentences.cn: 他一直被那些指控他有不正当商业行为的说法所困扰。

sentences.en: His best friend was killed by police under extremely questionable circumstances.
sentences.cn: 他最好的朋友在极其可疑的情况下被警察打死了。

sentences.en: I had gotten myself out of a questionable situation.
sentences.cn: 我使自己从涉嫌的境地里摆脱出来.

sentences.en: It is questionable whether the expenditure on this project is really justified.
sentences.cn: 该项目的开支是否真的合理还未可知。

sentences.en: It's questionable whether anything of substance has been achieved.
sentences.cn: 是否已经取得了任何实质性进展还是个问题。

sentences.en: The conclusions that they come to are highly questionable.
sentences.cn: 他们得出的结论大有问题。

sentences.en: The desire for wealth lured them into questionable dealings.
sentences.cn: 他们受了发财欲的引诱而被卷入可疑的交易.

sentences.en: The extent to which it helped to promote Britain's broader strategic interests was sometimes questionable.
sentences.cn: 它对于促进英国获得更广泛的战略利益到底有多大的帮助，这一点有时候值得怀疑。

sentences.en: The film is a comedy in highly questionable taste.
sentences.cn: 这是一部品位很成问题的喜剧片。

sentences.en: The policeman condescended to meet socially men of questionable character.

sentences.cn: 这个统计数据大有问题。

sentences.en: Their motives for undertaking this study are highly questionable.
sentences.cn: 他们承担这项研究的动机大有问题.

sentences.en: There are still a few questionable points in the case.
sentences.cn: 这个案件还有几个疑点.

sentences.en: Your argument is based on a set of questionable assumptions.
sentences.cn: 你的论证建立在一套有问题的假设上.

words.tran_cn: 可疑地，不清楚地；不可靠地

trans.tran_en: not likely to be true or correct
